snippet.title: Anthill – Official Nintendo Switch Trailer – Out Now!
snippet.description:
We're happy to announce that our breakthrough strategy game - Anthill - is OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch for $9.99/€9.99! By drawing pheromone trails, you direct your ground forces to different destinations, working with streams of units rather than individuals. Similar to a tower defense game, your mission is to protect the hill as wave upon wave of enemy bugs are thrown at you.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/imageform
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/imageform
